title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A creamy Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
description: Spaghetti Carbonara is a classic Roman pasta dish known for its rich, creamy sauce made without cream. The sauce is created from a mixture of eggs, hard cheese, pepper, and the starchy pasta water, with crispy bits of pancetta adding a delicious savory element. This dish perfectly embodies the beauty of Italian cuisine - simple ingredients transformed into something extraordinary.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil for the pasta
While water is heating, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and plenty of black pepper in a bowl
In a large skillet, cook pancetta over medium heat until crispy and fat has rendered, about 7-8 minutes
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water according to package instructions until al dente
Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water before draining the pasta
Working quickly, add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, tossing to combine
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing constantly
Add pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper

title: Mediterranean Grilled Salmon
summary: Fresh salmon fillets with Mediterranean herbs and lemon, perfect for a healthy dinner.
description: This Mediterranean-style grilled salmon is a perfect blend of healthy and delicious. The fish is marinated in a mixture of fresh herbs, lemon, and olive oil, then grilled to perfection. The result is a moist, flaky salmon with a wonderful herb-citrus flavor that is both light and satisfying. It is an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids and protein, making it a healthy choice for any meal.
instructions: In a bowl, mix olive oil, juice of 1 lemon, minced garlic, oregano, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper
Place salmon fillets in a shallow dish and pour the marinade over them
Let marinate for 30 minutes at room temperature
Preheat your grill to medium-high heat (around 375째F/190째C)
Oil the grill grates well to prevent sticking
Place salmon on the grill, skin-side up
Grill for 4-5 minutes until golden brown
Carefully flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes until done
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve with lemon wedges

title: Homemade Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
description: This authentic Margherita pizza brings the taste of Naples to your home. With a thin, crispy crust, sweet San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and aromatic basil, it is a testament to the beauty of simple, quality ingredients. The pizza is best cooked at high temperature to achieve that perfect balance of crispy and chewy texture that Neapolitan pizzas are famous for.
ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil for drizzling
instructions: Mix flour and salt in a large bowl
Dissolve yeast in lukewarm water and let sit for 5 minutes
Make a well in flour and add yeast mixture and olive oil
Knead for 10-15 minutes until smooth and elastic
Let dough rise for 1-2 hours until doubled in size
Preheat oven to highest setting (ideally 500째F/260째C) with pizza stone
Divide dough in two and shape into thin rounds
Top with crushed tomatoes, torn mozzarella, and a drizzle of olive oil
Bake for 10-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly
Add fresh basil leaves and extra olive oil after baking
